Misconfigurations.Title: Runs with a root primary or supplementary GID
Misconfigurations.Description: According to pod security standard 'Non-root groups', containers should be forbidden from running with a root primary or supplementary GID.
Misconfigurations.Message: issuer cryptlex-cert-manager-letsencrypt-production in default namespace should set spec.securityContext.runAsGroup, spec.securityContext.supplementalGroups[*] and spec.securityContext.fsGroup to integer greater than 0
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'containers[].securityContext.runAsGroup' to a non-zero integer or leave undefined.

Misconfigurations.Title: Service with External IP
Misconfigurations.Description: Services with external IP addresses allows direct access from the internet and might expose risk for CVE-2020-8554
Misconfigurations.Message: Service 'cryptlex-cert-manager-dashboard-external-service' in 'default' namespace should not set external IPs or external Name
